REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0807 reute u f BC-WEST-GERMANY'S-THESIN 04-09 0082

TEXT.TITLE: WEST GERMANY'S THESING ISSUES 10 MLN SFR BOND
TEXT.BODY: <Thesing-Verwaltungsgesellschaft GmbH> of Coesfeld, West Germany, is issuing a 10 mln Swiss franc eight year bond with an indicated 6-3/8 pct coupon and par issue price, joint lead managers Fintrelex SA and E.Gutzwiller und Cie, Banquiers said. Subscription is from May 7 until May 13. The issue is guaranteed by Schallplattentruhe A. Thesing GmbH und Co Kommanditgesellschaft, Martin Thesing Handelsgesellschaft. REUTER
